definition: a plan, usually evil (machination), sometimes good (sagacity)
kjvTranslation: (wicked) device, discretion, intent, witty invention, lewdness, mischievous (device), thought, wickedly.

translations.da: en plan, som regel ond (intriger), nogle gange god (klogskab)
translations.de: ein Plan, meist böse (Intrige), manchmal gut (Klugheit)
translations.el: ένα σχέδιο, συνήθως κακό (μηχανορραφία), μερικές φορές καλό (οξυδέρκεια)
translations.es: un plan, normalmente malvado (maquinación), a veces bueno (sagacidad)
translations.fr: un plan, généralement mauvais (machination), parfois bon (sagacité)
translations.id: sebuah rencana, biasanya jahat (tipu muslihat), terkadang baik (kecerdikan)
translations.it: un piano, di solito malvagio (macchinazione), a volte buono (sagacia)
translations.nb: en plan, vanligvis ond (intriger), noen ganger god (klokskap)
translations.nl: een plan, meestal slecht (machinatie), soms goed (scherpzinnigheid)
translations.pt: um plano, geralmente mau (maquinação), por vezes bom (sagacidade)
translations.ro: un plan, de obicei rău (mașinărie), uneori bun (sagacitate)
translations.sv: en plan, oftast ond (machination), ibland god (sagacity)
translations.tr: bir plan, genellikle kötü (entrika), bazen iyi (sağduyu)
translations.zh: 计谋，通常是邪恶的（阴谋），有时是善良的（圣明）
